caption: Bazille is a great place with good food and service.  The crab soup is a must.  Their sandwiches are simple  yet tasty.  The Fries are so worth it.  This is my go to place when I want a nice , relaxing and affordable.place.  Located inside Nordstrom Merrick Park, you can do lunch then shop and walk around a nice place.
(Translated by Google) The meat was regular  (Original) La carne estubo regular
Not as expected
My special menu is the chicken Asian salad yummy, and the delicious bread pudding clazed with white chocolate and berries 😋😋😋
Service was very very slow. Never got the lemon for my sparkling water. The crab bisque was very tasty even though just few crab pieces. The steak was also good.

The chefs special was a Reuben sandwich.  It was excellent,  flavorful & without the dripping messiness of too much dressing.  It came with their delicious french fries & aioli dipping sauce,  a favorite of mine. Our server was nice & …

Lunch with the Ladies..Great menu selection. Lobster Bisque soup was delicious, nice chunks of yummy Lobster. We particularly enjoyed our bottle of Sonoma Cutrer Chardonnay!.. Servers were attentive. We will definitely be back.  t
I do not understand  why they can not open till 7 pm
Very good food, excellent service. Great Value, very happy with our lunch.
(Translated by Google) Delicious  (Original) Delicioso
Fantastic food and quick service. Try the prime rib French dip sandwich. So delicious.
Best food! Great service & super fast. Never have had an issue with the food or service.
All of the food here is excellent.... one of my favs is the French Dip but I suggest trying everything!
Very good
Crab Bisque Chicken Cilantro Tacos Bazille Burger or Margarita Pizza Bread Pudding And you are welcome!
Best lobster bisque soup and the bistro sandwich is the best.

(Translated by Google) Really everything they offer there is the best, from their food dishes to the attention they offer.  (Original) Realmente todo lo que ahi ofrecen es de lo mejor, desde sus platos de comida hasta la atencion que ofrecen.
I love their customer service and food

The reviews don’t do Bazille justice. I come here at least weekly and it never disappoints. The staff is friendly and the food is reliably good. I mostly order to go (it’s always ready when I arrive), and I have never had service issues for dining either. The bistro club is my go-to order!
Food was very good. Ambiance is a bit weird because its in a Nordstrom but not much can be done about it lol. Great food and customer service from Raquel!!

Yasmin at the bar is a disaster. I’m Guessing she had people visiting her because even though the restaurant wasn’t packed she took extremely long to make my simple drink. My whole visit all I experienced was her screeching and screaming at …

(Translated by Google) First time I come! I used to come to coffee before! The menu varied enough! Good dishes, the onion soup was excellent! The Sanduche very good, the potatoes with the olives mayonnaise very good! Somewhat high prices …

This restaurant is not only great but aside from their delicious food and outstanding service, they carry the BEST straws; made out of plants that feel like a regular straw. The specials NEVER disappoint!

Nope this is not a place worth dining at. I went for an early dinner 5.30 pmish and witnessed a power struggle between an extremely power mongering waiter and a hostess doing her job. We were sat at a table and the fully bearded waiter …
(Translated by Google) Excellent meal!!  (Original) Excelente comida!!

Worst dining experience . If I were to write out everything she failed to do, I would be writing a novel... Yazmine with the big mouth/teeth/gums needs to be terminated from her position. That girl has her head in the clouds!
Perfect salmon! 100% recommend🔝🔝
Best food

odd atmosphere. employees act like their too good to actually help. I went Saturday afternoon and I hated the place and the people. the foods are smaller portions now too. do not recommend unless you want to be treated badly and then given …

Good looking restaurant feels cozy. Natalie the hostess was very nice and pleasant, showed us to our table. The French onion soup was a pretty good starter, a little pricey but good, also their burger was pretty darn good. I asked for it medium-rare and it came a little more like medium but still flavorful and the fries excellent.

Yeah... just don’t. Save yourself the money and trouble. It took 3 visits for me to come to terms that this place has deteriorated completely. From the menu to the servers/hostesses. It’s all gone downhill and don’t think there’s a chance …

I have always been a fan of the Bistro and decided to try out Bazille with my colleagues for a short business talk over lunch. I was, to say the least, absolutely embarrassed by where I chose to dine for our meeting. Our waitress was this …

From the food perspective, I actually prefer this Nordstrom over the one in Dadeland because it has more selection. I started with the crab bisque, and it was great. Also got to try the Kung Pao Brussel Sprouts that were also really good. …

The staff looks as if they were hired directly from a rehab facility. No tact, zero professionalism, no respect for their work, and they all look like low-life drug addicts? I was helped by 3 different waiters. Jackie was our original …
You can tell the hiring process is considerably loose. They hire anyone. Food has declined considerably as well as time has passed.

My server Yasmin was very off-putting to say the least. She kept staring at our table until I realized she was staring at my daughter? When she came back to our table it was NON-STOP FLIRTING!! My daughter is 17, while she might look mature …
BEAUTIFUL DECOR, FRIENDLY STAFF AND AMAZING CRAB BISQUE.

Little girl with attitude and no manners named ISABELLA. She helped me with my food order which was not ready even though when I called to confirm she said it was. Instead of admitting she made a simple mistake she started rolling her eyes …

Aweful experience! I used to love the restaurant that was here, but sadly it's declined considerably. Went with my 3 daughters. Pasta was rubbery, butter sause tasted fake, chicken fingers seemed to have been cooked in same oil  as fish as …

I haven't been to Bazille in quite some time and after today's experience it may be a long time before I go again. Nordstrom Cafe used to be one of my favorite places to eat. Then they changed the format to Bazille and it wasn't quite the …

We came to Bazille​ ​and my friends and I had such a fun and delicious time​​​.  We had different plates and I tried most of them. As for the drinks, I had the Amelia, which it was not just pretty looking but also soooooooo good. ​My …
Amazing service and food. Bartenders are very nice. If you wanna have a good time there ask for Alex she’s the best

One a word? AWFUL. AWFUL x 1,000,000. Period.  The staff here is in constant transition. As transit as the staff is, so is the quality of food. It's been AT LEAST two years since the quality of food, taste and presentation has been on par …
My hidden Gem..love the food and the white chocolate bread pudding.
Popular place to go to, food is good, good for children as well.

Oh my goodness, I just came back home from military leave and I just eat the best food I have ever had. I had no idea Nordstrom had this hidden gem. I felt immediately welcomed by the Host, and my server “Yazmine Herrera” was the most …

Our Kale Manchego salad was great as was the SOUTHWEST CHICKEN SANDWICH  . blackened chicken, pimento , b&b pickles, radish, butter lettuce, toasted artisan bun, herbed french fries and kalamata aïoli
Amazing lunch and service!

I have sat down to eat in one of my favorite restaurants, which I never thought I would find that they totally changed the menu and as if it were not enough, I ordered the gnocchi dish with lamb that turned out to be unpleasant. The gnocchi …

my favorite place where everyone knows my name.. i go to Bazille not only for my favorite cocktail smoke & heat, but for the smiling faces behind the bar, the fantastic waitstaff and amazing food.. i’m definitely a groupie! 😍  Not to mention i need my bi-weekly fix of the best fries..

Upscale. Delicious food and drinks. Waiting time was normal. Customer service was fine. Nice atmosphere. Really convenience if you are shopping at Nordstrom because you don’t have to go to any place. The menu has variety of food.

I usually do not write reviews on places but i came in here randomly on sunday because I was doing a quick mothers day shopping. I usually sit at bars so I was pleased to see there was actually a bar  inside a nordstrom, crazy right? I was …

There is no professionalism here not even with in management! Complained about my ditzy waitress Yazmine and the manager did nothing. He after went to go talk and laugh with her. This made me feel like a fool. I came here to see if …

It’s sad to see employees writing false reviews of themselves when they are horrible to their customers. I came to write about the menu change but had to comment at how idiotic people can be. This waitress I knew prior to there being name …

I went to Bazille recently for the first time and was not disappointed with my experience. Upon arrival, the hostesses were very kind and welcoming. My server was Yasmine and despite the reviews I read about her prior to writing this, I …

Well I've come here for quite some time and truly it was because of the old menu and a kind waitress Yazmine, I was so shocked to see the menu change and I really wasnt a fan. However Yazmine did guide me through the menu and helped me to …

I work by Merrick Park and there's really not a lot of food choices around. However, Bazille inside Nordstrom is that one place that I've never tried until last week. It just seems there's always a long wait every time I go for lunch. This …

Hostess ignored me for a good five minutes on her phone. There were few people in the restaurant but enough to worry about your job isabela! Once I called her attention instead she reacted back with a whole lotta attitude and gaveme the …

Our waitress Rachel was very kind and thorough. She made sure we were doing well various times during our meal. The reason why I’m giving 2 stars is the menu change. There are very few recognizable dishes besides the pizzas and the new …

Emailed management about the same issues mentioned below. Let’s see if they actually listen to their customers or continue to lose customers by hiring unfocused immature girls with nasty attitudes like Yazmine. Nordstrom has become less and …

Went to get my old favorites when I realized the menu TOTALLY changed!!! Ordered the cilantro lime tacos and they were lacking in flavor to say the least. Also had the skirt steak but it was nothing like the steak you previously had on the …

The menu change is annoying!!!! I feel like bazille just wants to make money. Not their customers happy. The new skirt steak is lacking and expensive. What happened to the old steak???? You won’t be making money if you have less customers …

Reading reviews below makes me wonder if management reads them?! I wouldn’t be writing this if they did so there’s my answer I suppose. The person continuously mentioned below still works at this restaurant. I went in for lunch and the same …

Let me start by clarifying that it is not in my nature to post reviews or commentaries on service. But, since I come to Bazille as often as I do, I thought it would be helpful to let you know how your staff is doing. I also see other …

THE SAME WAITRESS AS BELOW! Wow I was going to review without including my horrible waitresses name but she seems to be a common nightmare! I went in last week and YAZMINE was the absolute worst. Waited forever for my order to come out …

Usually get great service but had the great displeasure of having Yazmin as my waitress. Avoid this mess like a plague! You will be forgotten, your order will come out wrong, and you will be at the restaurant for longer than necessary …

My boyfriend and I come here often and have never been disappointed. The food is amazing  (especially the salads, fries, and crab mac and cheese) and the service is always great. We had Ervin today and he was helpful, friendly, and …
I love the food here and the service. I've been coming for a few years now. I even went while being on coral gables high. I just love the bisque and the steak. :))))
Great food, we go at least once a week, the only negative is the noise level!
Horrendous seating service drippy food

IMy family and I  have been coming to Nordstrom for years to eat. A few weems ago and today was a different experience. The restaurant was not full. By the time we order and were served it was 1 hour 5 minutes. Unacceptable !

Terrible service. Called for pick up and they said 15-20 minutes and had to wait an additional 20 minutes totaling 40 minutes. The layout of the restaurant sucks! When you pick up food your standing in the way of the waiters right where they're making the food.
It's the same food as what nordstrom cafe was but they raised the prices.
Margarita pizza. Best around

Visited the newly renovated Nordstrom restaurant today and will never be back.  Upon arrival there were 6 empty tables and no one waiting.  Hostess said she had texted the reservation holders before us & they had 10 minutes to arrive. …

The Bistro @ Merrick Park have been experiencing some renovations since The 6th of February. The Cafe will soon be a Full Bar & Restaurant. So it should be nice around the Spring / Summer 16' x R.I.P. Bistro & Hello, Nordstrom's NEW Bazille!

Whenever they have the lentil soup, it is my go-to item. Today I had the Cilantro Lime Salad without the tortilla strips. 500 delicious calories!  Our waiter, Danielle, was very attentive and gave us a huge pile of the mint chocolates after our meal. 500 more delicious calories!  As Ahnold says, "I'll be back."
